thread.section_title: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc | www.townfairtire.com
thread.title: Deanna
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Deanna

author: Deanna
title: Deanna
text: Juan Mateo helped me with pricing on a couple of options as I had cracked a wheel on my after market set and I needed new wheels and tires at this point. I had my stock wheels but would require new tires on those if I chose to switch. The packaged deal I got on the wheels and tires was so good, I could not go back to the stock wheels, nor did I want to, so thank you for such a good deal!
